env.name: PORT
env.label: Web Server Port
env.description: The TCP port that the Node-RED web server is listening on.

templates.title: TeamViewer IoT Agent & Connector for u-create web
templates.description: Publish u-control global variables to the TeamViewer IoT Service
templates.note:
Deploys a stack comprised of the TeamViewer IoT Agent and a Connector App to publish u-control global variables as TeamViewer metrics.
Please read and accept the TeamViewer EULA.

env.name: ACCEPT_EULA
env.label: Accept TeamViewer EULA
env.description: Please accept the TeamViewer EULA to use the Teamviewer IoT Agent.

select.text: Yes, I've read and accept the TeamViewer EULA
No, I do not accept the TeamViewer EULA

env.name: ASSIGNMENT_API_TOKEN
env.label: TeamViewer IoT Assignment Token
env.description: The assignment token must be obtained from the TeamViewer IoT Management Console.

env.name: ASSIGNMENT_GROUP_NAME
env.label: TeamViewer IoT Assignment Group Name
env.description: The device will be assigned to this group in the TeamViewer IoT Device Inventory.

env.name: HOSTNAME
env.label: Device Name
env.description: The device will be registered in the TeamViewer IoT Device Inventory under this name.

env.name: SENSOR_NAME
env.label: TeamViewer Sensor Name
env.description: Name of the sensor under which the metrics of this device are published. If left empty, a default name is generated.

env.name: UPDATE_INTERVAL
env.label: Update Interval
env.description: Metrics are published periodically at this interval.

env.name: VAR_PREFIX
env.label: Filter Global Variables by Prefix
env.description: Only global variables starting with this prefix are published as metrics. Leave empty to publish all global variables.
